pages.title: Frozen Heart
pages.text: A late-game power source that harnesses the extreme cold itself. Requires a diamond, frozen obsidian (forms on surface in Phase 4+), blue ice, and ice shards.$(br2)The Frozen Heart is the key component of the Geothermal Core â€” your endgame heat source.
A diamond at the center, surrounded by blue ice, ice shards, and frozen obsidian.
